Text: Not a registered copy :( if you use this it will print watermarks across the pages.
Same trouble... Not registered :-(.  Watermarks on print copies and asks for serial etc when trying to add own web address' etc.
why do people knowingly post these program..waste of time and bandwidth

Read me file says: "Program alredy (sic) registered
Just install and use". 

For me no watermarks. 

However the resulting flash refuses to load in firefox. But it loads fine in Internet Explorer.

Also, the app crashes after converting PDF to flash then clicking the 'View It' button. 

But manually opening the folder and then loading the flash with my browser is fine in IE but not ff. No watermark though. No clue why others see watermarks. Mine doesn't.

Oh. Am running this in win xp-32 bit inside of vmware client, inside of win7 64bit host.

Your milage may vary
Works for me, no watermark and works in all browsers.

it does work for 1 time only when you do the setup and it runs automatically.

for each time you will have to uninstall then re-install or else you will get the bookmarks on the final publication :(

Its working fine.

All you need is to run the application with the Administrator Rights.

Not Registered.  Not registered.

its a shame it come from the VIP.
